segments.text: Can you tell me the best way to look for an apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The local newspaper has ads for housing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there any way to find a roommate to share an apartment with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes you can post an advertisement saying that you need a roommate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do landlords charge for rent ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like an apartment for just yourself , or do you need it for two people ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are two of us , but we only need a one-bedroom apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should be able to easily find that for twelve hundred dollars a month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really would appreciate it if you could come look at apartments with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I â€™ ll go look at apartments with you anytime you want .
segments.speaker: S2
